item.title: switzerland — behind the scenes…
item.description: ever wondered what happens behind the scenes of touristic switzerland? ever wanted to know how the swiss manage to present one of the most beautiful places on earth in such impeccable order? ever interested in the music that drives the swiss?1 wonder no more: here’s a rare behind the scenes look at switzerland: now you know the true story… well, some of them… ↩
